name: Inspiration category visible on the navigation menu
description: As a user, I want to navigate the Inspirations section of the website and see the inspirational articles published

steps.name: Given  I am on the website
When  I notice the Inspirations section on the navigation menu, from the top of the page
Then  The Inspirations section should be displayed on the navigation menu, on header
